document.full_text: with their  political status still  unclear back in their homeland, members of  the belarus free theater will be  returning to new york next  month for a five-week stay at la mama.
document.title: belarus free theater returning to new york
lines_and_colors: with their  political status still  unclear back in their homeland, members of  the belarus free theater will be  returning to new york next  month for a five-week stay at la mama.
